send_to_cs: No escalations for this client, send to CS using the Support templates
For post-purchase inquiries send to CS using the Support template (shortcut: ESC)
‚ûú If the cx is having difficulties sending an email to CS via the link in the ESC temp - use Support 2 template (shortcut: TESC)
‚ûú If the cx is facing technical website issues while accessing the link, do NOT immediately send the TESC shortcut, troubleshoot first instead
For pre-purchase inquiries send to CS using the Support 2 template (shortcut: TESC)
tone: üÖøÔ∏è Use wording that is in line with the brand's voice and terminology found on the website
‚ûú e.g. Nova Kids, Nova Babes, Insta-worthy, slays, snatched, baddie, etc.
‚ûú Always look up the term's meaning before using it!
templates: For expired discounts use EXP shortcut
For login issues use LGI shortcut
promo_and_exclusions: If cx are looking for their 30% welcome code, ask to check their email (spam & promo)
Gift cards can be used on discounted items

Fashion Nova: Congrats! Your order #178809298 is confirmed.

Check the status of your order here: http://sms.fashionnova.com/a6ZwHn08i_g_ .
Hi I am having an issue
Fashion Nova: I can answer some basic questions over text, if I can't help you out I would be more than happy to redirect you to our advance team at Customer Care.
It is about an order I made about 15-20 mins ago
I need to cancel it or I need to change the payment on it
It was purchased using the wrong form of payment
If there is nothing you all can do, I will not be shopping with you all anymore. I don't believe it's fair to not issue refunds or to cancel orders.
Good morning!

Fashion Nova: Sorry! Unfortunately, once an order is placed we cannot cancel or modify it. If you are unhappy with the purchase you may return it. Please note that we do not provide cash refunds. Returns are refunded via store credit in the form of a Fashion Nova gift card. Returns are processed within 5-7 business days after your item(s) are delivered to us. To receive your store credit more quickly, use the pre-paid return label option in our Returns Portal: http://sms.fashionnova.com/a_HdLH6Sp8S_
Even if it was unauthorized?

Fashion Nova: Sorry for the delay. I'm afraid it won't be possible to make any changes to your order now that it's been placed. I understand how frustrating this must be, so I'm truly sorry for the inconvenience.

Do you have additional discounts for military spouses

NIRA: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out. Can I help you with anything else today?
So currently I am under that $49 a month program

Does this stop after a
Certain time or I just pay until I cancel?

NIRA: I'm happy to clarify this for you. I can see you're currently on the Nira Flex Program. The monthly charge continues for as long as you keep the product - there's no set end date. It doesn't automatically stop after a certain time.

The program is designed to be flexible, so you can use the product as long as you'd like and cancel anytime. There's no long-term commitment. It's also not financing or rent-to-own, so there's no ownership term that completes after a certain number of payments. If you ever decide to stop, you can cancel and return the product without cancellation or shipping fees.
Ok - if I want to take advantage of a promotion - how can I cancel and purchase one with current promotion
